name: FIGHT FOR ENERGY
description:
This game is a mixture of Tower Defense and Survival Waves games.

You are a battery fighting against other angry batteries who want to take control of your energy.
As a battery, you run with energy and you have to manage to upgrade your stats, build machines for defending and repair them.

Controls:
W, A, S, D => Move.
Mouse      => Aim.
LMC        => Shoot / Cancel shoot.

Tools:

  • Unity.
  • Visual Studio.
  • Blender.
  • Photoshop.
  • FL Studio.
  • Audacity.
